data.eml:eml: Bacteria (16S) and Eukaryotes (18S) from the Sor Rondane Mountains (East Antarctica)

A bacterial and microeukaryotic biodiversity study, using pyrosequencing analysis on a 454 GS FLX+ platformof partial SSU rRNA genes in terrestrial and aquatic habitats of the Sør Rondane Mountains, including soils, on mosses, endolithic communities, cryoconite holes and supraglacial and subglacial meltwater lenses.
